channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mem0’s scalable memory promises more reliable AI agents that remembers context across lengthy conversations
item.description: Mem0's architecture is designed to LLM memory and enhance consistency for more reliable agent performance in long conversations.

item.title: OpenAI names Instacart leader Fidji Simo as new CEO of Applications
item.description: Simo’s appointment may also hint at a broader productization push within OpenAI. Her background at Facebook and Instacart underscores...

item.title: Uber investing $100M into WeRide to bring robotaxis to 15 cities

item.title: This retiree figured out a way to pay almost no taxes. Here’s his secret.
item.description: A Fix My Portfolio reader shares how they avoided a “tax bomb” in retirement through Roth conversions and careful financial planning.

item.title: Trump rolls out U.K. trade agreement. It’s a relief — but deals with other countries are more crucial.
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday said his administration has reached a preliminary deal with the U.K. on trade, offering a bit of relief to investor...

item.title: MicroStrategy’s stock surges to highest price this year as bitcoin regains $100K
item.description: Bitcoin’s rally boosts the value of the cryptocurrency Strategy has purchased this year by more than $830 million.

item.title: Empty shelves, for-lease signs and job layoffs point to recession by summer
item.description: Stop the trade flow and you stop the economy — as Americans are about to learn.

item.title: Imagination unveils E-Series GPUs for graphics and AI at the edge
item.description: Imagination Technologies is unveiling its E-Series graphics processing units (GPUs) for graphics and AI processing at the edge.

item.title: ‘We live modestly’: My wife and I have $900K in stocks and $380K in savings and CDs. Do we have too much cash?
item.description: “My investment adviser says we have too much invested in cash instruments.”

item.title: Alibaba’s ‘ZeroSearch’ lets AI learn to google itself — slashing training costs by 88 percent
item.description: Alibaba’s ZeroSearch trains large language models to beat Google Search and slash API costs by 88%, redefining how AI learns to retrieve information.
